definition: to act cleverly to get what one desires/to get the best at least expense
to invite/to provoke/to demand or ask for/to send armed forces to suppress/to denounce or condemn/to marry (a woman)/to discuss or study

sentences.english: Natural body postures are not always flattering when preserved in a photograph.
sentences.chinese: 自然的身體姿態不會永遠在照片上討巧的。
